DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of Fractional Flow Reserve versus instant Wave-Free Ratio for assessment of coronary artery stenosis severity in routine practice - To compare FFR to iFR in arbitrary consecutive patients referred for percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI). - To investigate the influence of hyperemia on iFR. - To test reproducibility of iFR and FFR.
DOC.brief_title: Fractional Flow Reserve (FFR) Versus Instant Wave-Free Ratio (iFR)
DOC.criteria: all consecutive patients undergoing FFR assessment for standard clinical indications. prior CABG extremely tortuous, calcified lesions coronary artery occlusion acute MI within 5 days
